parameters: \pop[3]What if Dante stopped talking for once?
\pop[3]Right. I was just... thinking about stuff.
You know, what if things were different...?
\pop[4]I imagine we'd still be at this convention.
I mean, I wasn't gonna turn down a weekend of fun.
Or, do you mean if they never existed at all?
\pop[3]Oh, that second one is \c[14]way\c[0] more interesting.
\pop[4]If \c[10]Argus\c[0] didn't exist, I think I'd have been born in the city.
Imagine that. We could've met \c[14]ages\c[0] ago.
\pop[3]It's a big world out there, Kyron.
Without \c[10]Argus\c[0], I don't think I'd be here.
When I had to move, it chose where to take me.
\pop[4]And you just trusted it to make the right choice?
\pop[4]So \c[10]The System\c[0] got you where you needed to go.
That's great. All it did was force the \c[23]zeros\c[0] into colony life.
\pop[3]I'm sensing that we're at odds, here.
What's good for you can be bad for someone else.
\pop[4]So without \c[10]Argus\c[0], we might never have met each other.
That's kind of a grim thought...
\pop[3]I'm not sure what \c[14]my\c[0] life would be like without \c[10]Argus\c[0].
But... I really hope that I'd still get to meet all of you.
\pop[4]I'm sure we'd be at a concert of yours someday.
\pop[4]I think we'd \c[14]all\c[0] still be best friends.
\pop[3]Even if I never moved to Toronto?
How would we meet in the first place, then?
\pop[4]The odds are stacked against us, here.
\pop[4]But we can't just give up because the odds are bad.
I know in my heart that we'd all be friends, no matter \c[14]what\c[0].
\pop[4]And sometimes, belief is all you need to make things happen.
Remember, I'm no stranger when it comes to fighting the impossible.
\pop[4]Finding a couple friends is nothing compared to opposing \c[10]Argus\c[0].
If I ever lost all of you? I can \c[14]guarantee\c[0] that I'd find you.
At the end of the day, \c[14]I\c[0] shape my own life.
\pop[4]Maybe you were right from the start, then.
\pop[4]If we'd all still meet, and become best friends?
Then even if things \c[14]were\c[0] different, we'd still be at this convention.
\pop[3]Maybe with a little less treason, though.
